description.narrative: To catalyse development finance and responsible private sector investment into commercially viable agri-business operations with strong links to smallholder farmers. This will drive productivity gains on farm and transformational investments into off farm agriculture related activities. The main expected development outcomes are: (i) productivity gains along the whole value chain and an increase in modern value addition (development of off-farm services and light weight agro-processing industries); (ii) additional jobs in farm and non- farm enterprises and increased incomes; (iii) increased market opportunities and commercial viability for smallholders; (iv) a strong portfolio of commercially viable agriculture investments that are nutrition-sensitive, empower women and tackle climate change adaptation and mitigation; and (v) increased and diversify agriculture and food production to sustainably meet food security and climate challenges, and investments in Climate smart agriculture.
